name: Friendship & Covid-19
description:
Welcome to the most relatable choose your own adventure game of 2020! Embark on a journey where two life-long friends, Jesse and Daniel, enter the realm of COVID-19. Whether you decide to help them overcome the obstacles of this new reality OR let their friendship crumble, you have full control over their destiny! What will you choose? 

-> please be advised that the game will work best on Windows. If you are not satisfied with the ending you got the first time around you will have to relaunch the page --refreshing the page will not work
